RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 16600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 28. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 29 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 29 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IRISH UNITY was hustled to the lead soon after the start, set a rapid pace in the five path early, dropped inside nearing the turn, shook clear in upper stretch under left handed urging and lasted under strong handling. BREEZY MONEY pressured the winner four wide in the six path down the backstretch, angled in two wide entering the turn, loomed boldly nearing the quarter pole, drifted to the five path entering the stretch giving up ground the came on again late. SHADOW TRACER stalked the pace tow then three wide and went evenly. WAR NOVEL bobbled at the start, rushed to contention along the inside before a quarter, had speed into the stretch then faded. VALHALLA AIR BASE broke sharply, dropped back quickly to trail and passed a tiring rival in the stretch. LAZARUS PROJECT had speed through the turn then wilted.

ENTRY.NAME: Shadow Tracer
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 2-3wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Unity
ENTRY.COMMENT: set fast pace, shook clear, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: War Novel
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, rushed inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lazarus Project
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed turn, wilted

ENTRY.NAME: Valhalla Air Base
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, dropped back, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Breezy Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 4-2wide, drifted top lane, gaining,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Claiming Purse 13100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANGEL'S DESTINY stalked the pace along the inside into the far turn, got through to make the lead before the quarter pole then drew off under right handed urging to win as much the best. TWELVE SHARP chased the pace two then three wide, drifted to the five path entering the stretch and finished second best. DUDE'S MIST DATE unhurried early, finished with good courage along the inside. BAD AND BEAUTIFUL failed to menace. LIFENHOWULIVIT away alertly, set the pace off the rail in the three path for nearly six furlongs then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Lifenhowulivit
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 3path 1/4 pole, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Angel's Destiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, got through 2nd turn, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Twelve Sharp
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2-3wide, drifted 5path top lane, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Dude's Mist Date
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, finished well inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Bad and Beautiful
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 29 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 29 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12 ,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEWD bever far back, moved up steadily outside rivals three wide, made the lead past the five sixteenths pole then widened the balance of the trip under right handed urging to win as much the best. CONTESSINA vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch, dug in late two wide and got up for second. ROWDY DAISY away alertly, set the pace along the inside until midway on the far turn then was outfinished. PURDY PUMKIN pressed the pace two wide, dropped back on the far turn then came up again late three wide. TIME FOR CUPID trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Contessina
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, late rally, 2 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Rowdy Daisy
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside 2nd turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Purdy Pumkin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, dropped back, came again, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lewd
ENTRY.COMMENT: steady advance, 3 wide, took charge 2nd turn, drew off, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Time for Cupid
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 29, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 29 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 29 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 ( Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAROL'S ROYALTY broke in front, set all the pace, widened into the stretch under left handed urging and prevailed under an energetic hand ride. LITTLE BIRD FLASH pressured the winner two wide and finished second best. SWEET BELEN was restless the gate, threw her head at the start, rushed to contention then went evenly. COURTED failed to menace. ISLAND WINTER close up along the inside, weakened in the stretch. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND AFTeR REVIEW TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Courted
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Island Winter
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Little Bird Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Belen
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, threw head start, rushed to contention, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Carol's Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, shook clear, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 35. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HALO EFFECT rushed up along the inside to gain a narrow advantage before a quarter, set the balance of the pace under pressure and proved best under strong handling. THELMA LUCILLE stalked the pace two wide into the stretch, angled out to the four path and finished second best. SNAZZY vied for the lead along the inside and finished determinedly. VAMONOS PIACENTE trailed into the stretch and found her best stride late two wide. ONE RICH KITTEN outside, failed to respond. Z B READY broke in front and drifted out to the nine path while maintained the lead for nearly a quarter, kept pressured on the winner two wide into the stretch then stopped late.

ENTRY.NAME: Halo Effect
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, inside, set pressured pace, proved best, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Snazzy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, finished determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Vamonos Piacente
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, best stride late, 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: One Rich Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Thelma Lucille
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 2 wide, shifted 4path top lane, gamely second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Z B Ready
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, wide early lead, pressed 2w, stopped lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 29 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Sinc e June 29 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUSHING BETTY sprinted to the lead shortly after the start, set all the pace along the inside under pressure and held firmly under strong handling. SWEET QUEEN BEE pressured the winner two wide and finished second best. CEVICHE stalked the pace along the inside and went evenly. ALARM CLOCK moved up three wide on the turn then failed to sustain that bid. SIERRA DIAMOND trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Blushing Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, held well, fully extended,

ENTRY.NAME: Alarm Clock
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Ceviche
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Sierra Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Queen Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 55. Claiming Purse 19900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 29 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 29 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12, 500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FABULOUS CLOWN was bumped a few strides out of the gate, trailed down the backstretch, circled rivals three wide through the turn, closed rapidly under mild left handed urging through the final stages and was along in time. HITCH CITY broke in front, set all the pace, widened into the stretch then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. HOSANNA chased the pace two wide and finished evenly in the four path. MAYBE FRANKY drifted out at the start bumping the winner then failed to menace. WEEKENDING stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch then weakened. WAR MOON had brief speed four wide.

ENTRY.NAME: Weekending
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Maybe Franky
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out, bumped start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Clown
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, circled field, closed fast, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Hitch City
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, drew off top lane, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Hosanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, evenly 4path

ENTRY.NAME: War Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, 4 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 35. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: C MORE PRIDE hesitated at the start, settled within striking distance along the rail, lacked racing room on the turn, shifted outside, rallied determinedly under right handed urging while out past the middle of the racetrack and got up in time. POLLY PRISSY PANTS never far back, rallied in the middle of the racetrack and just missed in a game effort. MY TWO JAKES pressed the pace along the inside into the stretch, gained a narrow lead at the furlong marker, drifted out to the six path and was outfinished. HAPPYBDAYMRPREZ stumbled at the start, rallied three wide to make the lead on the turn, battled the balance of the trip while carried out to the seven path and was outfinished. NICKATYE delayed the start while refusing to load, set the early pace two wide and stopped in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Jakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, led, drifted 6path, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Happybdaymrprez
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, rallied 3 wide turn, led, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: C More Pride
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated start, inside, no room turn, altered outside, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Polly Prissy Pants
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied mid track, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Nickatye
ENTRY.COMMENT: wouldn't load gate, early lead, stopped lane
